Config.CostToName.Name: Cost to name
Config.CostToName.Description: The number of cinder shards required to rename an item
Config.UnforgeClearsName.Name: Unforge clears name
Config.UnforgeClearsName.Description: Whether or not to clear the name when the item is unforged (Could happen regardless for un-combining rings)
Config.ShowCompanionName.Name: Show companion name
Config.ShowCompanionName.Description: Whether or not to show the name of the companion when the mouse is over them
Config.ShowToolbar.Name: Show toolbar name
Config.ShowToolbar.Description: Whether or not to show the name of the current tool above/under the toolbar for a second when it's selected
